name: $draft
desc: The consent has been proposed but not yet agreed to by all parties. The negotiation stage.

name: $proposed
desc: The consent is to be followed and enforced.

name: $active
desc: The consent has been rejected by one or more of the parties.

name: $rejected
desc: The consent is terminated or replaced.

name: $inactive
desc: The consent was created wrongly (e.g. wrong patient) and should be ignored.
